summary: August 30 is the 242nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
For other people with a similar name, see William Daily
Bill Daily  is an American comedian and dramatic actor, and a veteran of many television sitcoms. He is best known for playing astronaut Roger Healey on I Dream of Jeannie and commercial airline navigator Howard Borden on The Bob Newhart Show.
^ "Bill Daily's Gemlike Assists to Make 'Dream of Jeannie' a Hit". Schenectedy Gazette. October 19, 1968. p. 13.
title: Bill Daily
